explains: n. （表演者或表演团的）全部剧目，全部曲目，全部节目；全部技能（或才能）

sentences.en: Meredith D'Ambrosio has thousands of songs in her repertoire.
sentences.cn: 梅雷迪思•丹布罗西奥的全部曲目达到几千首。

sentences.en: His repertoire encompassed everything from Bach to Schoenberg.
sentences.cn: 他的表演曲目从巴赫到勋伯格，样样俱全。

sentences.en: Merely expanding the orchestra's repertoire will not be enough.
sentences.cn: 仅仅扩大乐团的演奏曲目是不够的。
